name: sms-server
description: 1. Clone this Repo 2. `cd` to the cloned directory 3. run `npm install` (pre req: you will need node.js installed, preppend `sudo` if you need root priveleges). 4. open `config/config.js` and set your local mysql creds 5. run `NODE_ENV=development node server.js` to start the server on linux based systems.  5. for windows run `SET NODE_ENV=development node server.js` 6. :)
author: Loops Digital
